description: Flames engulfed the centre on Saturday, as Greece announced fresh restrictions on asylum seekers.
title: Greece migrant crisis: Refugee centre ablaze as tensions rise
title_page: Greece migrant crisis: Refugee centre ablaze as tensions rise - BBC News
maintext: But since then, tensions between the EU and Turkey have flared on various issues. In recent weeks, a fierce onslaught by Syrian forces and their Russian backers on Idlib, the last province held by Syrian rebels, has led to clashes with Turkey, which supports some rebel groups.
